title: Validate email size greater than 32 MB (Default size), with 'dlp-setting' feature enabled;  with DLP Fallback action feature flag enabled
custom_steps:
- Create Email outbound policy with multiple DLP Profiles and Terminal action. if none of DLP profile matches
- Draft Email with attachment of total size >= 32MB but <= 64 MB with DLP Sensitive content
- [Attachment >25 mb is not supported by Gmail]
- review ASP connection in smtpmod and dispatch logs
- Email should at receiver
- Look for Policy hit and alert
custom_expected:
- Verify policy hit happen and alert is generated
- SMTP won't add additional header and  Look out DLP failure shouldn't be due to file-size limit exceeded
"dlp_fail_reason": "DLP scan file-size limit exceeded",
"dlp_scan_failed": "yes"
- Verify no smtp proxy crash due to holding large emails
